translations: adj.询问的，打听的，爱追究的（同 enquiring）
v.打听；调查（inquire 的现在分词，同 enquire）

sentences.sentence: A growing number of customers have been inquiring about the pending price rises.
sentences.translation: 越来越多的顾客在询问即将出现的价格上涨问题。

sentences.sentence: Tom turned an inquiring look toward Hertford, who whispered, "Your Majesty will signify consent."
sentences.translation: 汤姆带着询问的目光望着赫德福，他低声说：“陛下应表示同意。”

sentences.sentence: Many have reservations, but keep these to themselves in what they perceive as a climate hostile to the pursuit of understanding for its own sake and the idea of an inquiring, creative spirit.
sentences.translation: 许多人对此有所保留，但在他们所认为的一种不利于为求知而求知和追求探究、创造精神的气氛中，他们却把这些保留了下来。
